original: Hofverberg, Oskar Emanuel, disponent, Norrköping, f. 30/3/87 i S :t Olof, Krist. 1. G. 26 m. Ellen Gustafsson. Barn: Inga f. 27, UMa 29, Bertil 30. — Stud. v. handelsskola 09-10, språkstud. i Hamburg 13-14. Start. Limfirman Hernia i Norrköp. 20. Medil. av Haindielsföiren. i Nornköp, Ro-tary. Frimurarorden, W-’sex m,. fil.
translated: Hofverberg, Oskar Emanuel, manager, Norrköping, b. March 30, 1887 in St. Olof, Kristianstad. Married on March 26 to Ellen Gustafsson with three children: Inga, born in 1927, unmarried, Uma, born in 1929, and Bertil, born in 1930. Studied at a commercial school in 1909-1910 and language studies in Hamburg from 1913-1914. Started at Limfirman Hernia in Norrköping in 1920. Member of the Handelsföiren, Rotary, Freemasonry, W-sex m, and holds a degree in philosophy.
